keys.Key.isPressed: Indicates if the key is currently pressed
keys.Key.onEvent: Register code for a key event
keys.Key.pauseUntil: Pauses until a key is pressed or released
keys.Key.wasPressed: Indicates if the key was pressed since the last call
keys.dx: Gets the horizontal movement, given the step and state of keys
keys.dy: Gets the vertical movement, given the step and state of keys
keys.pauseUntilAnyKey: Pauses the program until a key is pressed
